name: Bunker Björn
description:
Take your trusty laser rifle and strap into the boots of Björn the Bunkercrawler. Destroy enemy robots to find your way deeper and deeper into the old bunker complex of Wuhnsgrad. Until you can go no more.

  • Use WASD or Left Stick to move. Use your mouse or Right Stick to look.
  • Use LMB or Right Trigger to shoot.
  • Use Spacebar or Left Trigger to jump.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 in pretty much exactly 72 hours.
